title: Waste Exemption Types
description: A run-down of the different waste exemption types, to help you understand whether you need an environmental permit or a waste exemption. This article is a counterpart to our previous article on waster exemptions.

summary:
A run-down of the different waste exemption types.

We'll aim to help you understand under what circumstances a person or company requires a waste exemption, or an actual environmental permit

children.value:
Under current legislation, there are certain circumstances where individuals and companies
concerned with the usage, treatment, storage and/or disposal of waste can and should
be exempt from holding a valid waste licence.
